description: This file contains utility functions for validation purposes used across various parts of the application, such as phone number validation, CSV header validation, template form validation, and variable detection within text.

methods.name: isValidPhone(value)
methods.description: Validates phone numbers to match an E.164-like format allowing optional '+' and 8-15 digits.

methods.name: normalizePhone(value)
methods.description: Normalizes phone numbers by removing spaces, hyphens, and parentheses, preserving leading '+' if present.

methods.name: validateCSVHeaders(headers, expectedHeaders = CSVHeaders.CONTACTS)
methods.description: Checks uploaded CSV headers against expected headers, returning validity, missing, and extra headers.

methods.name: validateTemplateForm(form)
methods.description: Validates the structure and content of a message template form, ensuring required fields are present and within specified length limits.

methods.name: hasVariables(text)
methods.description: Detects presence of template variables indicated by double curly braces in the provided text.
